description:
With the Spotify app, you can explore an extensive library of music and podcasts for free. Curate the best playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and original podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are, and unlock our catalogue of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
• Listen to over 100 million songs and 6 million podcast titles
• Explore our selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
• Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
• Discover personalised music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
• Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player – find the sounds that you love and stream music and podcasts online for free. Enjoy personalised playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourites and more.

• Stream millions of free songs and podcasts
• Create playlists with your favourite music
• Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
• Discover personalised playlists made just for you, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
• Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist every week
• Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists
• Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
• See your most played songs, genres, artists and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
• Stream music across your devices with Spotify
• Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation®, Xbox®, smartwatch, in your car and more – limited number of device models apply

Spotify Premium – a great way to enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. By pressing download, you can access your songs, playlists, podcasts and audiobooks offline, wherever you are.
• Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks – all in one place
• Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
• Enjoy full on-demand playback
• Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ audiobook titles with 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.
• Superior sound quality on supported devices
• AI DJ: a personalised guide that knows your music taste so well that it can choose what to play for you
• Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch and in your car
• Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
• Download songs, podcasts and audiobooks for offline listening without an Internet connection
• No contract required – cancel your subscription whenever you want

Spotify lets you play music wherever you are. Listen to your favourite songs and discover new music, podcasts and audiobooks with the Spotify app!

LOVE SPOTIFY?
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spotify
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spotify

JioSaavn is India’s no. 1 FREE music app housing a vast and exclusive music library of 8 crore songs. You will not find these songs on any other song app for free. The best part? You can also set songs from JioSaavn as your JioTune (callertune) on your Jio number. JioSaavn also has India’s top podcasts hosted by star podcasters!

JioSaavn is one app, but it serves many purposes. Here are some things you can use JioSaavn for:

Bollywood music, Hindi Music, English music, Punjabi music, Tamil music, Telugu music, Gujarati music, Bengali Music, Marathi Music, Bhojpuri music, Kannada music, Malayalam music, Odia music - Whatever your music language, play it on JioSaavn. 

Justin Bieber songs, Sid Sriram songs, Shreya Ghoshal songs, Jubin Nautiyal songs, Diljit Dosanjh songs, Ilaiyaraaja songs, Kumar Sanu songs, Michael Jackson songs, Alka Yagnik songs - Get access to music by your current favourite stars or your all-time favourite legends. 

Pop songs, Trending songs, Classic songs, EDM songs, Romantic songs, Bollywood retro songs, Rock songs, Folk songs, Rap songs, Devotional songs, Remix songs, Indie songs - Find songs in all your favourite music genres on JioSaavn.

Sing aloud with lyrics of superhit songs like Kesariya, As It Was, Peaches, Le Le Aayi Coca Cola, Summer High, Anju Vanna poove, Bimbilikki Pilapi, The Warriorr, Macherla Niyojakavargam, Megharajana Raaga, Singara Siriye, Thallumaala, Dagdi Chawl 2, Obosheshe, Bas Kar Pagli, The Villagers, Kabootar.

Comedy shows, film & TV shows, sports shows, thriller shows, crime shows, health & wellness shows, English podcasts, Hindi podcasts, Tamil shows - Listen to India’s most popular podcasts and audio shows across genres and languages. Top-rated shows on JioSaavn include On Purpose with Jay Shetty, Pyaar Actually, Woice with Warikoo Podcast, Get Sleepy: Sleep meditation and stories, and ZARA KHAUFF SE SUNO. 

Now Trending Hindi, Best Of Romance Hindi, Fresh Tunes, Now Playing Pop, Gedi Shedi, Lub Ju, Pudhu Tunes, Top Kuthu, Kotha Tunes, Now Trending Telugu, Hosa Tunes, Premaloka, Puthuputhan Tunes, Now Trending Malayalam, Navin Tunes, Now Trending Marathi, Bhalobashar Gallery, Nrityer Taale, Now Trending Bhojpuri, Pyar Ke Jadu, Nava Tunes, Haryanvi Dance Hits - Tune in to addictive playlists in your language.

Top Hindi JioTunes, Top English JioTunes, Punjabi Hip-Hop JioTunes, Tamil Romantic JioTunes, Top JioTunes 2022 - Set JioTunes (Jio caller tunes) from your favourite films, be it Bollywood, Tollywood, or Kollywood. Entertain your callers with a peppy song before you pick up the phone! 

JioSaavn Pro is JioSaavn’s premium music subscription and ranked as India’s best music listening experience. Its features include:

Non-stop, ad-free music. 
Unlimited song downloads.
Unlimited JioTunes.
High-quality sound. 
Download Ringtones
Offline play (play music without internet or WiFi).
Exclusive music and podcasts.

Enjoy all of this with JioSaavn Pro daily, weekly, or yearly plans at your convenience. And, Jio users - you get a one-month free trial of JioSaavn Pro! Jio users can also listen music & set JioTunes from JioSaavn on the My Jio app.

Know that you have come to the right place if you are looking for any of these - Jiosaavn, Jio Saavn, Jio Saavan, Jiosaavan, Jio saavan, Jio tunes, Jio caller tune.

Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/jiosaavn 
Follow us on Twitter: @jiosaavn 
Email us anytime at feedback@jiosaavn.com 
Privacy & Terms: http://www.jiosaavn.com/corporate/privacy http://www.jiosaavn.com/corporate/terms 

English content is served in India.
Content, served in the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, United Arab Emirates, Australia, Singapore, Switzerland, Pakistan, New Zealand, Germany, Hong Kong, Netherlands, Malaysia, Norway, Maldives, South Africa, Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon and Egypt.

Connecting you to the world of music:
● Music content including live performances, covers, remixes and music content you can't find elsewhere
● Thousands of curated playlists across many genres and activities

Get personalised music, perfect for every moment:
● Personalised playlists and Mixes
● Activity mixes made for you
● Create playlists with song suggestions or collaborate with other music fans to create the perfect playlist
● Neatly organised Library to see all of your liked and added songs, playlists you created and artists you subscribed to

Stay on top of the trends and discover new music:
● Take a look at new releases
● Discover music-based genres (Hip Hop, Pop, Country, Dance and Electronic, Blues, Indie and Alternative, Jazz, Kpop, Latin, Rock and more)
● Discover music-based mood (Chill, Feel Good, Energy Booster, Sleep, Focus, Romance, Workout, Commute, Party)
● Explore top charts from all over the world

Enhanced your listening experience with unique features:
● Song lyrics so you can sing along to your favourites
● Upload songs from your devices so you can enjoy them in one place with YouTube Music
● Listen on your phone, desktop, smart speaker, smart TV, car, smart watch and within your favourite apps.
● Compatible with Google Maps, Waze, Google Assistant and more.

Upgrade to Music Premium (available in selected countries) to enjoy:
● Listen ad-free
● Play music in the background
● Access your downloads, including smart downloads
● Switch seamlessly between audio and video, only with YouTube Music

Wynk Music is a music streaming & downloading app, for every mood! From Rahman to Rihanna, it has over 24 million+ free songs spanning Indian & International music. Stream & download songs on Wynk Music app & discover music from its huge library covering genres including Bollywood, Pop, Rock, Bhangra, Devotional, Bhajans, Happy, Sad, Romantic, Party, Chill, Love & Old retro. Get access to music in Regional languages like Punjabi, Bhojpuri, Rajasthani, Marathi, Bengali, Kannada, Gujarati, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam & other South Indian languages. We have music for all tastes!

Access a wide range of free music, well-curated playlists, artists, & free podcasts with Wynk. Listen to your favorite artists' albums or discover new music, podcasts, & top songs. Make your playlists with the newest songs that reflect your mood.

Enjoy unlimited music from our huge variety of playlists curated especially for you or create your own playlist & share with your friends. For those who like to just sit back & relax while listening to music, we've got playlists for every mood to choose from.

Wynk is a free Podcast app as well!
Now use Wynk as a Free Podcast app or Podcast player to listen to free podcasts. Enjoy the latest and most popular podcasts in different languages like English & Hindi only on Wynk Music App.


Make your callers groove with Airtel Hellotunes! Say goodbye to the old school 'Ring-Ring' & set your favourite songs as your Hellotune on Wynk absolutely FREE! Make your Caller tune personalized with Wynk’s Special Hellotunes, for upto 5 close friends. Not just this, your friends can like or dislike the Special Hellotunes set for them, dedicate a Hellotune back to you, and recommend new tunes as per their own choice. So what are you waiting for? Spread some love through your favorite tunes.


Subscribe to stream unlimited music, get unlimited song downloads and enjoy music offline without data charges. Guess what? You get Wynk Music subscription with Airtel data plans.


More reasons to start Wynk-ing :
• Stream 22 million+ songs across Indian & International music
• High quality music streaming
• Thousands of curated playlists by moods, artists, genres, devotional, classics & more in Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, English, Hindi
• Enjoy the best audio Podcasts with Free Podcast App*
• Setting your favourite songs as Hellotunes!*
• Buffer music streaming at low internet speed. Use on mobile internet or Wi-Fi
• Set caller ring back tone for top trending songs
• Playlists to like, follow & share to enjoy hours of uninterrupted music
• Stream in the language of your choice
• Support for Chromecast
• Control your music playback with your Apple Watch
• Play your favorite music with voice command using Siri
• Connect Wynk to your car infotainment system via CarPlay


Wynk Premium subscription features:*
• Unlimited Ad-Free Music Streaming
• Unlimited in-app downloads. Download old and new songs to play them offline
• First month subscription is free as a trial offer


Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/airtelwynk

Mail us for Feedback: contact@wynk.in
View our Terms of use at https://www.wynk.in/music/tos.html
View our Privacy Policy at http://www.wynk.in/music/privacyPolicy.html

Experience the magic of Gaana Music App! - Mp3, Music & Offline Songs  

Are you ready to elevate your music journey? Look no further than Gaana, the classic destination for all your music swings! Whether you are seeking heart-pounding beats, soul-soothing melodies, captivating podcasts or radio, Gaana's offline music player is your answer to a musical world like no other.  

With an expansive library, over 20 million songs , Gaana is much more than a song app; it's your key to a world of musical delight. Explore a wide variety of Music Playlist featuring DJ tracks, love songs, devotional, Bollywood Classics songs, Upbeat Bhangra hits, Regional songs including Tamil songs, Hindi songs, Punjabi songs, Kannada songs, Telugu songs, Bhojpuri songs or bhojpuri gana and more.  

Check out the latest trending songs like Saiyaara, Angaaron, Qayde Se (From "Metro ... In Dino"), Aavan Jaavan (From "WAR 2"), Millionaire songs and more new songs. Gaana curated playlists like Top Hindi Songs, Top English Songs, Best 90s & Party Music on the Gaana music app or download mp3 songs for seamless listening. 

That’s not all! Gaana 2.0 app latest features significantly enhance the music streaming experience. 

Gaana 2.0 - New Music Experience 

Introducing Gaana 2.0, latest app integrated with Song Catcher, New Search & Explore & Shuffle & Play features. These features provide a more intuitive and customised listening journey for music lovers. 

Song Catcher: Instantly identify songs from short audio clips. 

Voice Search: Effortlessly find tracks using voice commands. 

New Recommendation: Personalised music suggestions tailored to your preferences. 

New Search & Explore: Easily discover new music and artists. 

Shuffle & Play: Enjoy a dynamic and unpredictable playlist. 

Party Mode: Enjoy Music Flashlight & Volume Booster. 

Gaana premium music app also allows you to download mp3 songs of an extensive array of artists spanning genres like Bollywood Music, Punjabi Songs, Sufi Songs, Regional Songs, International Music, Pop Music, Old Songs, EDM Music, Rock Songs, Folk Music, Rap Songs, Jazz Music, Hip Hop, K-pop Music, Workout Songs, Nursery Rhymes, Kids Songs, Romance Songs, Sad Songs & Bhangra Indulge in the melodies of renowned artists such as Lata Mangeshkar Songs, Kishore Kumar, Alka Yagnik, Prateek, Sonu Nigam songs, Shreya Ghoshal's Song, Arijit Singh's Songs, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Songs, Jubin Nautiyal's Songs, Guru Randhawa Songs, A R Rahman songs, Anirudh Ravichander, Devi Sri Prasad, Sid Sriram's Songs and more. 

Looking to explore international music? Listen to Taylor Swift, Ed Sheeran, BLACKPINK, BTS, Madonna, Selena Gomez and other international pop acts on Gaana. 

Not just that, delve into a rich collection of Devotional songs, Spiritual chants, Krishna bhajans, Ayyappan songs, Ganpati aarti, Sai Baba bhajans, Bhakti songs, Ganesh aarti, Hanuman chalisa, Ram aayenge, Maa Ka Bulawa Aaya Hai and more. 

Why Gaana Plus? 

Vast Music Library: Explore a treasure trove of melodies spanning diverse genres and languages. 

Award-Winning Podcasts: Explore podcasts and shows like Andhaghaaram, Sunday Suspense and a lot more on Gaana app. 

Seamless Playback: Immerse yourself in uninterrupted musical bliss, anytime, anywhere. 

Offline Listening: Take your favourite tunes offline and enjoy them on the go, sans the internet. 

Personalised Experience: Tailor your listening journey with personalised recommendations and playlists. 

Unlimited Downloads: To play offline music, Unlimited In-app MP3 Song Download. 

Dolby Atmos: Enjoy your favorite songs with Dolby experience 

Subscribe to Gaana Plus App for ₹119 per month or ₹709 yearly. Automatically renewed each month via any payment mode. Permission is needed to read OTP sent via SMS. Legitimate & duty-licensed content. 

Reach Us! 

instagram.com/gaana 

facebook.com/gaana.com 

twitter.com/gaana 

bit.ly/gaana-youtube 

gaana.com 

*English songs are currently available in India only

Amazon Prime Music is now available to Amazon Prime members in India at no additional cost to their membership. Prime members will enjoy unlimited ad-free streaming of millions of songs, voice controlled music with Alexa in the mobile app, and unlimited offline downloads. Customers can enjoy music in various languages including English, Hindi, Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Kannada, Marathi and more available on the Amazon Prime Music service in India. Amazon Music Unlimited is not available in India.


If you subscribe to Amazon Music Unlimited via iTunes where available, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the then current membership period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of each membership period at the rate of your selected plan. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes. Nowmusi is the ultimate iOS app designed to revolutionize your wake-up experience with personalized music. Say goodbye to the monotonous buzz of standard alarm sounds and greet each day with the melodies you love. Whether you prefer energetic beats to kickstart your morning or soothing tunes to wake up gently, Nowmusi offers the perfect solution tailored to your unique tastes and lifestyle. 

Key Features of Nowmusi

Customizable Alarm Songs: Whether it’s your favorite pop anthem, a relaxing instrumental, or a motivational track, Nowmusi allows you to personalize your wake-up soundscape to match your mood and preferences.

Multiple Alarms: Set multiple alarms for different times and days of the week. Customize each alarm with a different song, allowing you to vary your wake-up music based on your schedule or the day’s activities.

In App Purchase:

What's that song? Shazam will instantly identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram, YouTube & Snapchat. Discover concerts near you, song lyrics, videos & more. With tens of millions of daily users, Shazam is trusted by music lovers worldwide.

“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” – Pharrell Williams, GQ 
“I don't know how we ever survived before Shazam” – Marshmello 
“Shazam is a kind of magic… You hear a song, hold your phone up like a wand and it tells you exactly what song it is, who sang it and lets you add it to your playlist or share it to your social media… How is that not magic?!” – Calum Scott

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

* Identify music in an instant.
* Discover live shows near you from your favourite artists or through curated recommendations.
* Recognise songs even when you’re offline, using headphones or on a different app.
* Revisit your music discovery history in your library anytime.
* Get recommended songs and playlists similar to the music you’ve discovered.

USE SHAZAM ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

* Enable the Shazam widgets on your Lock Screen or Home Screen.
* Ask Siri, “What’s this song?” to use Shazam hands-free.
* Automate music discovery with the Shazam Shortcut in the Shortcuts app.

CONNECT WITH YOUR MUSIC

* Unlock extras from artists around the world.
* Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify, YouTube Music, Amazon Music & Deezer.
* Listen and add songs directly to your Apple Music playlists.
* Watch music videos of the songs you discover in Apple Music or YouTube.
* Follow along to songs with real-time, karaoke-style lyrics.
* See what’s trending locally and globally with Shazam Charts.

Availability and features may vary by country. For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/. Find out more and get support from AppleCare at https://support.apple.com/guide/shazam/welcome.

description:
Cut mp3, m4a, ringtone application help you cut a favorite part of a audio song, a music file. You can use the cut result as ringtone, alarm, notification tone or a music song.
You can manage cut results easily and you can share them with your friends.

This app is a best choice to make your own ringtones (support mp3, aiff, wav, m4a formats). User can record a live audio then use this app as editor to edit and trim the best parts.
editor supports mp3, aiff, wav, m4a and most other music formats. Music editor, alarm tone maker, ringtone cutter or notification tone creator are other names of this application.

With mp3 cutter and ringtone maker you can:
+ Select music (mp3, aiff, wav, m4a) from your mobile then choose part to be chopped from the music song
+ Or record a live audio then choose part to be chopped from your audio
Then you can save as ringtone, alarm, notification or a new song to listen. You also can share it.

Detail features:
- Find all music, audio files stored in your phone memory and sd cards.
- Edit music, audio with two options: trim (remove left part and right part) or remove middle part. Select parts by setting start & end for the audio clip or using an optional touch interface.
- Record live audio, music for editing.
- Save as ringtone, alarm, notification or a new song to listen.
- Option to delete (with confirmation alert) the created Tone.
- Set the new clip as default ringtone or assign to contacts, using this editor.
- Manage contact ringtone

Please download audio cutter, mp3 cutter to make the best ringtone from favorite songs. If you have question about audio cutter and ringtone maker please send feedback to us.

To view the EULA and Privacy Policy, please visit:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula
https://sites.google.com/view/musiccutter-audioeditor/home

Amplify your imagination. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI music model, Suno transforms your ideas into songs—no instruments needed, just your creative vision. Whether you’re a shower-singer, aspiring songwriter, or charting artist, Suno empowers you to create and discover music like never before.

Generate music from prompts, images, or videos with the world’s best AI music model:
• Transform your ideas into fully-produced songs and beats with a single prompt. Create 10 songs or beats per day at no cost.
• Inspiration begins with you. Write a text prompt like "Create a rap song about walking my dog," sing a melody, hum a tune, or tap out a beat.
• Record or upload audio to personalize your music, or generate songs from images and videos.

Write original lyrics with effortlessly:
• Whether you're in your feels with emotional ballads, hyped on energetic rap verses, or hooked on catchy pop, our lyrics generator and AI songwriter helps you craft custom lyrics that match your style and creative vision.

Create playlists for every mood and moment:
• Curate your personal AI music library and organize your favorite tracks, beats, and instrumentals into playlists you can revisit anytime.
• Manage your AI songs, view track details, and fine-tune your playlists—your music making journey is uniquely yours with Suno.

Discover new music and connect with artists:
• Stay inspired by listening to tracks created by other users and explore the best AI music across genres like rock, rap, hip hop, pop, and more.
• Find fresh favorites by browsing trending music and follow artists to stay connected.
• Discover new voice styles, AI covers, rising talent, and beat makers from around the world.

Music has no boundaries at Suno. Anything you imagine can take shape as a song to share. Whether you're taking your first steps in music making or chasing your next hit, infinite possibilities begin with a simple prompt in our AI song generator. Feeling pro? Take full creative control: adjust vocals, tweak structure, fine-tune melodies, and edit every detail to your vision.

Suno is how imagination becomes music, and music becomes yours.

—

Super Sound is a powerful audio editor. It supports audio editing, cutting, splicing, mixing, convert format, voice changer, convert video to audio and so on.

【Music editing functions】
